name: trader-note-build-ai
description: TradeAssist MVP - Trade note generation and market matching system

scripts.kill:ports: lsof -ti :3100 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti :3102 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'Ports cleared'
scripts.dev: npm run kill:ports && concurrently "BACKEND_PORT=3100 nodemon src/index.ts" "cd src/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:backend: npm run kill:ports && BACKEND_PORT=3100 nodemon src/index.ts
scripts.dev:frontend: lsof -ti :3102 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; cd src/frontend && npm run dev
